title: Mongoose Skills
podstawy-mongoose-desc: Installing and configuring Mongoose, connecting to MongoDB.
modele-mongoose-desc: Creating models, instance and static methods.
crud-desc: Creating, reading, updating, and deleting documents.
middleware-desc: Pre and post middleware, using the next() function.

walidacja-desc: Creating validation rules in Mongoose schemas.
